Gresham.Fairview City Jail: The Fairview City Jail is a former jail building located in Ne-cha-co-kee Park at 120 1st Street in Fairview, Oregon, in the United States. It was built in 1915, next to the old Fairview City Hall at 60 Main Street. It is a simple, rectangular, concrete building, 10 feet by 20 feet, with 8 foot high walls painted with a grey paint.
